p: Correlation between the chemical structure and the inhibitory activity of the screened derivatives over DHFR enzyme revealed that the existence of benzene sulphonamide moiety in 3a, 6a, 8a and 9a led to enhanced activity, and the potency order was 6a > 3a > 8a > 9a. Moreover, the attachment of pyrazoline ring with hydrazinyl group in 3a or hybridisation with pyridazine in 6a possessed better inhibitory activity than with triazine or triazole in 8a and 9a.
